name: Estrategias Digitales
description: Estrategas Digitales is a young Mexican company founded in 2008 that seeks to improve the competitiveness of their customers through design and new technologies. The company forms a multidisciplinary and expert team that focuses in developing projects of "value" for internet and electronic media.

locations.address: Cañada 2, Lomas de Tarango, Álvaro Obregón
